instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

threads.title: 820-2936 fake charging
threads.message: so this board will charge white the computer is off.  Light comes on and os says the charger is plugged in.  however the battery drains.  He came in with a fake charger, so pretty sure that killed it.  Where to start on this guy?

threads.title: 820-2936 fake charging
threads.message: Tried known good battery and/or DC in board? If so, post resistance between pins 17/18 and 27/28 of the ISL6259 as well as voltage on PPBUS without the battery

threads.title: 820-2936 fake charging
threads.message:
17/18/ - 3 ohms
27/28 - 2.02

These values are correct no?  I tried a good magsafe, but not battery.  Have to order one, do you think this could be caused by a battery?

threads.title: 820-2936 fake charging
threads.message: 20.2 ohms or 2.02 kohms? If 20.2 ohms, try another battery first. Bad battery will obviously not charge. Voltage on PPBUS without the battery?

threads.title: 820-2936 fake charging
threads.message:
2.02khoms sorry, my bad.

Computer will not turn on without battery. keeps resetting after 2-3 seconds.

ppbus is 12.57v then drops to 10.8v

threads.title: 820-2936 fake charging
threads.message:
That's the problem 2.02 kohms is way way way off. There are a few possibilities here:

1. R7021 is blown
2. R7022 is blown (both could be blown as well)
3.R7020 is blown (unlikely but possible)
4. The traces between the ISL and R7021/2 are blown OR between R7021/2 and R7020 are blown.

Also a good idea to replace the ISL6259 when you figure out which of the above are true.

threads.title: 820-2936 fake charging
threads.message: okay both r7021 and r7022 was blown.  bad isl6259 as well.  all is fixed :)  computer is turning on without battery now!
